version_description: Our team is working permanently to improve your experience.

The wait is over: Just Dance 2016 is here! Use your device as a controller on Just Dance 2016! (Wii U, PlayStation®4, Xbox One only)

This app is also compatible with the Just Dance 2015 console game for PlayStation®4 and Xbox One.
Our team is working permanently to improve your experience.

This app is also compatible with the Just Dance 2015 console game for PlayStation®4 and Xbox One.

Try Just Dance 2017 for free! Dance your heart out to the worldwide hit “Sorry” by Justin Bieber on Wii U™, PlayStation®4 or Xbox One.

This app is also compatible with Just Dance 2016 on Wii U™, PlayStation®4 and Xbox One and Just Dance 2015 on PlayStation®4 and Xbox One.

Just Dance 2017 is out! Dance your heart out on your Wii U™, PlayStation®4 or Xbox One using your phone as your controller on Just Dance 2017!

Access Just Dance TV and watch hilarious video content on-the-go.

Take photos and apply Just Dance filters and share them on your social pages!

This app is also compatible with Just Dance 2016 on Wii U™, PlayStation®4 and Xbox One and Just Dance 2015 on PlayStation®4 and Xbox One.

The Just Dance® 2018 Demo for Nintendo Switch™, Wii U™, PlayStation®4 or Xbox One is out now!

Download the free Demo on your console to try out one dance from the upcoming Just Dance 2018 game! Dance your heart out to "24K Magic" by Bruno Mars, using your phone as a controller!

This app is also compatible with Just Dance® 2017 on Nintendo Switch™, Wii U™, PlayStation®4 and Xbox One; Just Dance® 2016 on Wii U™, PlayStation®4 and Xbox One and Just Dance® 2015 on PlayStation®4 and Xbox One.

Just Dance® 2018 for Nintendo Switch™, Wii U™, PlayStation®4 or Xbox One is out now!

Dance your heart out over 40 new hot tracks and more than 300 songs, available with Just Dance Unlimited, using your phone as a controller!

This app is also compatible with Just Dance® 2017 on Nintendo Switch™, Wii U™, PlayStation®4 and Xbox One; Just Dance® 2016 on Wii U™, PlayStation®4 and Xbox One and Just Dance® 2015 on PlayStation®4 and Xbox One.

New update available!
Playing Just Dance on Xbox One? Make sure to update your Just Dance Controller app as well as your Xbox One console with the latest versions available to keep playing Just Dance!

Just Dance® 2019 is available on October 25th. No Controller? No problem! Play with the updated Just Dance® Controller App on your PlayStation®4 or Xbox One. Use your phone as a controller to score your moves on over 40 new hot songs and over 400 more available with the Just Dance Unlimited subscription service.
Playing on older versions of Just Dance®? This app is also compatible with Just Dance®2018 on Nintendo Switch™, Wii U™, PlayStation® 4 and Xbox One, Just Dance® 2017 on Nintendo Switch™, Wii U™, Playstation®4, Xbox One and PC and Just Dance® 2016 on Wii U™, Playstation®4 and Xbox One.

Just Dance® 2020 is now available! Celebrate 10 years of dancing and endless fun in Just Dance® 2020, and play the game with the updated Just Dance Controller app on your Nintendo Switch™, Nintendo Switch™ Lite, PlayStation®4, Xbox One, and Stadia™.

Want to try the game for free? The Just Dance Controller app is also compatible with the Just Dance® 2020 demo on Nintendo Switch™, Nintendo Switch™ Lite, PlayStation®4, and Xbox One.
• We fixed the crash on iOS 13.4

Just Dance® 2021 is coming out on November 12th, 2020! Turn up the volume and get together: it’s time to dance with Just Dance® 2021! Play the game with the updated Just Dance® Controller app on your Nintendo Switch™, Nintendo Switch™ Lite, PlayStation®4, PlayStation®5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X, and Stadia™.

Improved stability of Just Dance® Controller app and Xbox Series X pairing flow.

Play the game with the updated Just Dance® Controller app on your Nintendo Switch™, Nintendo Switch™ Lite, PlayStation®4, PlayStation®5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X and Stadia™.
